description: Nikoloz Basilashvili is accused by his ex-wife of attacking her - an allegation he denies.
title: Nikoloz Basilashvili: Georgian tennis star charged with assaulting ex-wife
title_page: Nikoloz Basilashvili: Georgian tennis star charged with assaulting ex-wife - BBC News
maintext: During his career, Basilashvili won three ATP titles, but is yet to progress further than the fourth round in any of the four majors.
